romRDS 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Read or Make RDS

    rom.Rd

    Reads or makes .rds if file is not available and loads the object into memory.

    rom(
  obj_name,
  ...,
  dir = "rds",
  file_name_sufix = "",
  file_name_sufix_sep = ".",
  file_name_extention = ".rds",
  obj_name_has_extention = FALSE,
  compress_rds = FALSE,
  return_obj_name = FALSE,
  do_not_make = FALSE,
  quietly = FALSE,
  assign_to_obj_name = TRUE
)

    Arguments

    obj_name
    ...
    dir

    Directory where to look for or save to .rds. Default is "./rds"

    file_name_sufix

    e.g., date or version. Default is ""

    file_name_sufix_sep

    Default is "."

    file_name_extention

    Default is ".rds"

    obj_name_has_extention

    Default is FALSE

    compress_rds

    Default is FALSE. It is faster to read and write if rds is not compressed.

    return_obj_name

    Default is FALSE

    do_not_make

    Default is FALSE

    quietly

    Default is FALSE

    assign_to_obj_name

    Value

    Returns the object or name of the obj (if return_obj_name is TRUE).

    Contents

    Developed by Stanislav Vlasov.
